faqs.question: What is Recondition Hub?
faqs.answer: We provide a marketplace where buyers can find reconditioned vehicles from trusted recondition houses.

faqs.question: Do you sell vehicles directly?
faqs.answer: No, we don’t sell vehicles ourselves. We connect buyers with trusted recondition houses through our platform.

faqs.question: How can I find a vehicle on the platform?
faqs.answer: You can browse available listings, compare options, and visit the recondition house or showroom to inspect the vehicle before purchase.

faqs.question: Is there a fee to use the platform?
faqs.answer: Our platform is free for buyers. However, recondition houses may have listing fees based on their selected plan.

faqs.question: How do I contact a (seller)recondition house?
faqs.answer: Each listing includes a contact option, allowing you to directly reach out to the recondition house for more details or to schedule a visit.

faqs.question: Are the vehicles inspected before being listed?
faqs.answer: Recondition houses are responsible for providing accurate details. We recommend buyers inspect the vehicle in person before making a purchase.

faqs.question: Can I list my reconditioned vehicle for sale?
faqs.answer: Only trusted recondition houses can list vehicles on our platform. If you own a recondition house, you can apply to become a seller.

faqs.question: Do you offer financing options for buyers?
faqs.answer: We do not provide direct financing, but some recondition houses may offer financing options. You can check with the seller for details.

faqs.question: What should I do if I face issues with a seller?
faqs.answer: If you encounter any issues, please report the seller through our platform, and our team will review the case to ensure a safe marketplace.

terms.title: Platform Usage
content: Recondition Hub is a marketplace service that connects buyers with trusted recondition houses for buying reconditioned bike and cars.
We do not sell vehicles directly but facilitate the connection between buyers and recondition houses.

terms.title: Account Registration
content: Recondition houses must create an account to access the platform's services.
The recondition houses listing vehicles are responsible for the content, condition, and accuracy of their listings.

terms.title: Vehicle Listings
content: Recondition houses must ensure the vehicles they list on the platform are accurately described and meet the required quality standards.
Buyers should verify the condition of vehicles with the recondition house before purchasing.

terms.title: Fees
content: Our platform is free for buyers to use.
Recondition houses may incur listing fees based on the plan selected for displaying vehicles.

terms.title: User Conduct
content: You agree not to misuse the platform or engage in fraudulent activities.
Buyers should contact recondition houses directly for vehicle details or concerns.

terms.title: Payments and Transactions
content: Transactions between buyers and recondition houses are conducted outside the platform. Recondition Hub is not involved in any payment processing or financial agreements between parties.

terms.title: Platform Availability
content: We strive to maintain uninterrupted access to the platform. However, we do not guarantee that the platform will always be available or error-free.

terms.title: Privacy and Data Protection
content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy.
By using the platform, you consent to the collection and use of your data as described in the privacy policy.

terms.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Recondition Hub is not liable for any disputes, damages, or issues arising from transactions between buyers and recondition houses.
We are not responsible for the quality, accuracy, or condition of vehicles listed on the platform.

terms.title: Termination of Service
content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate any user's account if they violate the terms of use or engage in harmful activities.

terms.title: Changes to Terms
content: Recondition Hub may update these terms and conditions from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes to these terms.
By using the Recondition Hub platform, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.
